alert.note: Alert for Northern Carroll; Northern Coos; Northern Grafton; Southern Coos; Southern Grafton (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 09 at 10:12AM EST until February 09 at 10:00PM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 10 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations up to two inches, sleet accumulations up to one tenth of an inch and ice accumulations around a light glaze. * WHERE...Northern Carroll, Northern Coos, Northern Grafton, Southern Coos, and Southern Grafton Counties. * WHEN...From 3 PM this afternoon to 10 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...A period of mixed precipitation is expected with air temperatures slowly rising above freezing allowing precipitation to change to rain. Expect slippery road conditions and avoid travel if possible. Even light snowfall amounts can accumulate on roads and cause dangerous driving conditions due to snow covered roads. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by going to newengland511.org

area.areaDesc: Northern Carroll; Northern Coos; Northern Grafton; Southern Coos; Southern Grafton
